WRITING.TEXT: I'm used to being disappointed by anime endings. I still like to enjoy the ten plus hours of awesome anyway!
I just bumped Soul Eater up to the top of my "Need to Watch" list!
...I'm sorry, I tried to give you an everstone to hold, but you kept dropping it. So I put it up your butt. It should come out...eventually.

How racist. How dare you assume black noise is more harmful!
Somebody get SRS down here, stat!
